name: Animal Herding
description: Animal Herding is a stressful multitasking game where you require quick thinking and quick reflexes in an attempt to both keep animals from escaping and put up a new fence to finish the level.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP SP2+, Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 2.0 GHz or faster (Dual-core recommended) Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 128 MB Card, supports Shader Model 2.0 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c Compatible sound card Additional Notes: Touchscreen recommended
